name: Soaring Autumn
description:
Entry for the Cozy Autumn Game Jam (2022)

- Created by Gathrey Reeding

I spent most of the development time on this bird controller, had so much fun creating it. In the time that was left over (24hours) I slapped this little world together, to just fly around and enjoy the sounds.

There are a few Collectibles in the game, but mostly its just there as extra juice. 

Flying is quite fun!

Controls:

Keyboard:

WASD - Movement

RMB - Thrust

Q/E - Roll

LMB - Land/Fly

ESC - Pause

Gamepad

L-STICK - Movement

RT - Thrust

LB/RB - Roll

A - Land/Fly

START - Pause
